alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 17 at 9:58PM EDT until April 18 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO NOON EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. For the higher elevations and foothills, wind gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Tennessee, Sullivan County, primarily at and near Holston Mountain. In Virginia, Russell and Washington VA Counties near the Clinch Mountains and Brumley Mountain. * WHEN...From 1 AM to noon EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
